    http://www.food.com/recipe/absolute-best-ever-lasagna-28768

    Absolute Best Ever Lasagna

    By ratherbeswimmin'

    Select One

    • Contact This Chef
    • Chef's Page
    • Chef's Recipes
    • Chef's Photos
    • Chef's Reviews
    • Chef's Cookbooks
    • Chef's Menus
    • Add to Favorites

    Added May 18, 2002 | Recipe #28768

    Categories: Main dish Lasagna Ground beef

    More
    • Beef
    • Pasta
    • Cheese
    • Eggs/dairy
    • Meat
    • Pasta, rice and grains
    • Italian
    • European
    • Low Carb
    • Low in...
    • Romantic
    • Comfort food
    • Weeknight
    • Taste/mood
    • Oven
    • < 4 hours
    • Time to make
    • Equipment
    • Recipe
    • Ratings & Reviews(406)
    • Photos(37)
    Sponsored by:

    Photo by carmenskitchen

    1/37 Photos of Absolute Best Ever Lasagna

    more photos
    5.0 406

    Rate it! | Read 406 Reviews

    Total Time:

    Prep Time:

    Cook Time:

    2 hrs 10 mins

    1 hrs 30 mins

    40 mins

    ratherbeswimmin''s Note:

    My family's favorite. This is a very meaty lasagna. We prefer it with cottage cheese, but you can easily substitute ricotta.

    • Print Recipe
    • Full Screen
    SAVE THIS RECIPE TO:
    • Cookbook loading

      Save this recipe in your online cookbook to access when you need it.

    • Menu

      Create a new menu and save this recipe for easy meal planning.

    • Meal Planner

      Add this recipe to a weekly meal plan.

    • Shopping List

      Add this recipe's ingredients to your weekly shopping list.

    Manage this recipe:
    • Add a Private Note

      Note pairing ideas, substitutions and more - only you can see it!

    • Submit a Correction

      Spot a typo or missing ingredient? Submit your correction for review.

    • Ask a Question

      Get answers about this recipe in our Cooking Q&A forum.

    Share This Recipe:
    Send via Email
    Send to Mobile

    Text a link of this recipe to your web-enabled cell phone.

    Ingredients:

    Servings:

    Units: US | Metric

    • 1 1/2 lbs lean ground beef
    • 1/2 lb Italian sausage
    • 1 large onion, chopped
    • 2 garlic cloves, minced
    • 1 teaspoon salt (or to taste)
    • 1 tablespoon dried parsley flakes
    • 1 tablespoon dried oregano
    • 1 tablespoon dried basil
    • 2 (14 1/2 ounce) cans whole tomatoes, undrained and chopped
    • 2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste
    • 24 ounces cottage cheese or 24 ounces ricotta cheese
    • 2 eggs, beaten
    • 1/2 teaspoon pepper
    • 2 tablespoons parsley
    • 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
    • 1 lb mozzarella cheese, divided
    • 12 -15 lasagna noodles

    Directions:

    1. 1
      Brown ground beef, Italian sausage, onion and garlic.
    2. 2
      Add salt and next 5 ingredients; stirring until well mixed.
    3. 3
      Simmer 1 hour.
    4. 4
      Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions; drain and set aside.
    5. 5
      Spray a 13 x 9" baking pan with cooking spray.
    6. 6
      Combine cottage cheese, eggs, pepper, 2 tablespoons parsley, Parmesan cheese and 1/2 of mozzarella cheese; In a lasagna pan, layer noodles, meat sauce, and cheese mixture; repeat.
    7. 7
      Top off with layer of noodles; sprinkle evenly with remaining mozzarella cheese.
    8. 8
      Bake at 375F for 30 to 40 minutes, or until cheese mixture is thoroughly melted.

    Browse Our Top Main Dish Recipes

    • Italian-Style Lasagna

      By Random Rachel

      Select One

      • Chef's Page

      • Chef's Cookbooks
      • Chef's Menus
      • Add to Favorites

      on June 14, 2002

      55

      Made this last weekend for a special family get together. It was so outstanding. My guests thought it deserved more than 5 stars. Really, the best lasagna I have ever eaten. The preparation involves a little time but it was worth it. This is the best!!

      people found this review Helpful. Was this review helpful to you? Yes | No We don't know who you are. Sign in or create an account

    • By mom of 4

      Select One

      • Contact This Chef
      • Chef's Page
      • Chef's Recipes
      • Chef's Photos
      • Chef's Reviews
      • Chef's Cookbooks
      • Chef's Menus
      • Add to Favorites

      on June 21, 2002

      55

      WOW!!! This was absolutely the BEST!!! I made this tonight for dinner and it was delicious. My DH had 2 BIG helpings and he LOVED it!! Definately something I will make again and again. I followed the recipie exactly and added just a bit of sugar to the sauce. I always do to tomato sauces. BRAVO.

      people found this review Helpful. Was this review helpful to you? Yes | No We don't know who you are. Sign in or create an account

    • By FruitLoop

      Select One

      • Contact This Chef
      • Chef's Page
      • Chef's Recipes
      • Chef's Photos
      • Chef's Reviews
      • Chef's Cookbooks
      • Chef's Menus
      • Add to Favorites

      on July 02, 2002

      55

      Oh my goodness sakes alive!!! This is without a doubt the best lasagna I have ever tasted. I can't rave about it enough. I love the mixture of ground beef and Italian sausage in the sauce. Rich, and cheesy as well. Thanks

      people found this review Helpful. Was this review helpful to you? Yes | No We don't know who you are. Sign in or create an account
